attributes.action: Requisition the UK properties of Putin’s associates to house Ukrainian refugees
attributes.additional_details: Our Government and Parliament should requisition the UK properties of Putin’s associates to house Ukrainian refugees in order to help all those in desperate need
attributes.background: Our Government and Parliament should requisition the UK properties of Putin’s associates to house Ukrainian refugees

rejection.details:
Decisions about housing refugees is an operational decision for the Home Office and individual local authorities, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Seize frozen Russian assets and give proceeds to Ukraine to help with rebuilding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119
